import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { ProductTable, Total, Container } from './style' import {MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete} from 'react-icons/md' function Cart (){ const [cart, setCart ] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { setCart() }, []) return ( PRODUTO QTD SUBTOTAL {cart.map(product => ( {product.title} {product.priceFormated}
R$ 258,80 ))}
Total R$ 1920,80
) } export default Cart
